venue.address_2: Just off of Boylston St between Charles + Tremont, 1/2 block from Boylston T-stop, its inside 'the alley'
venue.name: The Estate

item.description:
Halloween will be here before we know it! Save the date and join us for a fun night at the annual Sinners and Saints Halloween party- one of Boston's biggest Halloween parties!

Enjoy a ghoulish cocktail reception featuring complimentary light hors d'oeuvres for the first hour. Then, enjoy a costume contest with over $1,000 in prizes, Complimentary Body Painting, DJ and dancing, and more.


Prizes will be awarded for the:

* Best "Sinner" Costume - Wear something naughty or devilish!
* Best "Saint" Costume - Come dressed sweet and angelic!
* Best Overall Costume - Get creative! Choose a costume outside of the theme.

LOOKING FOR BEST JERSEY SHORE SIN OR SAINT COSTUME

Tickets are currently $15 each or two for $25. Get yours early because the price will increase to $25. Advanced tickets are required. You can get tickets using this link:

http://www.bostoneven...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine upstairs near the entrance. If need to, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Sinners and Saints Halloween Costume Party!
